item.title: Project 2: Industrial Security Automation
item.description: Security and automation is a prime concern in our day-to-day life. The approach to home and industrial automation and security system design is almost standardized nowadays. In this project, we have tried to increase these standards by combining new design techniques and developed a low cost industrial automated security system where all the data of a industry will be recorded time to time. Everyone wants to be as much as secure as possible.
